item.description: Change 'type' or 'strategy' above to try different Component Types, like Sequencer

items.content: <speak>Welcome to Date a Voice, the first ever voice assistant dating simulator. Who would you like to go on a date with? You can pick Alexa, Siri, Google, Cortana, or Bixby.</speak>
items.description: Expand on 'items' array to add multiple prompts, use response template arguments by adding it to 'content' like this ${payload.input_argument_name} and add SSML by changing 'contentType' to 'SSML' and adding SSML to 'content' <amazon:effect name="whispered">like that</amazon:effect>

items.content: <speak>Welcome to Date a Voice. Who would you like to go on a date with? Date options are Alexa, Siri, Google, Cortana, or Bixby.</speak>
items.description: Expand on 'items' array to add multiple prompts, use response template arguments by adding it to 'content' like this ${payload.input_argument_name} and add SSML by changing 'contentType' to 'SSML' and adding SSML to 'content' <amazon:effect name="whispered">like that</amazon:effect>
